Aura: Angelic Halo.name: Aura: Angelic Halo
Aura: Angelic Halo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.w3uGXDVEdbLFZVO0]{Angelic Halo}

Allies in your halo's emanation who are healed by a heal spell gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Aura: Bless.name: Aura: Bless
Aura: Bless.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}

You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet.

Aura: Manifest Will.name: Aura: Manifest Will
Aura: Manifest Will.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqBfoUaWDennHYoZ]{Manifest Will}

You emanate a 10-ft aura. If you have the Multifaceted Will feat, you can choose any tradition. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to saves against spells with that tradition trait.

Aura: Protective Wards.name: Aura: Protective Wards
Aura: Protective Wards.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Wards}

You and any allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Each time you Sustain the spell, the emanation's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 30 feet.

Aura: Protector's Sphere.name: Aura: Protector's Sphere
Aura: Protector's Sphere.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DH9Y3RQGWO0GzXGU]{Protector's Sphere}

You gain resistance to all damage. Your allies also gain this resistance while in the aura.

Aura: Spiral of Horrors.name: Aura: Spiral of Horrors
Aura: Spiral of Horrors.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Spiral of Horrors}

Foes in the area are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.

Effect: Bone Flense (Damage).name: Effect: Bone Flense (Damage)
Effect: Bone Flense (Damage).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V4IpjSlefultlOuY]{Bone Flense}

The target takes an additional d6 persistent bleed damage from the Strike of the imbued weapon.

Effect: Bone Flense (Reaction).name: Effect: Bone Flense (Reaction)
Effect: Bone Flense (Reaction).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V4IpjSlefultlOuY]{Bone Flense}

You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.wfUIsKBxCBfXi1TF]{Erupting Spurs} reaction.

Effect: Guidance Immunity.name: Effect: Guidance Immunity
Effect: Guidance Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} on you, rendering you immune to the effect of the spell for the duration.

Effect: Shield Immunity.name: Effect: Shield Immunity
Effect: Shield Immunity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).name: Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul)
Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fu8Ml47ZfXpSYe7E]{Aberrant Form}

You transform yourself into a Large aberration. You gain the aberration trait, as well as the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 13 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of aberration you choose:

  • Chuul

    • Speed 30 feet, swim 25 feet
    • Melee 1 claw (reach 10 feet) Damage 2d8+8 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 26 temporary HP, attack modifier +22, damage bonus +13, and Athletics +23.

Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.name: Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch
Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aiHbS8FGNYAQBF62]{Accelerating Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Acid Grip.name: Spell Effect: Acid Grip
Spell Effect: Acid Grip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9h9YCncqah6VNsKf]{Acid Grip}

While you are taking persistent damage from this spell, you take a –10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).name: Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim)
Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUnw9YXaW3YyaCAU]{Adapt Self}.

You gain a Swim Speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.name: Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation
Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GoKkejPj5yWJPIPK]{Adaptive Ablation}

You gain resistance the triggering energy type; you gain this resistance after you take the triggering damage, so it applies only to future damage you take during the duration.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).name: Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Bat

    • Speed 20 feet, fly Speed 30 feet; precise echolocation 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2d8 piercing;
    • Melee 1 wing (agile), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse.name: Spell Effect: Albatross Curse
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}.

You and allies within 30 feet of the target gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Circumsta.name: Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Circumstance Bonus)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Circumsta.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target of the Albatross Curse.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Critical.name: Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You must roll twice and take the worse result on your next Will save.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You must roll twice and take the worse result on your next Will save.

Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.name: Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch
Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cy5W8U4yN9P1EvBy]{Amplifying Touch}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC, a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and deal 1 additional spirit damage on all your strikes. In addition, all your Strikes are holy.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.name: Spell Effect: Ancestral Form
Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xEjGEBvTfDJECSki]{Ancestral Form}

You gain resistance to all damage (except force and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), and this resistance is doubled against non-magical and precision damage.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.name: Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories
Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories}

You either gain a status bonus to the next spell attack roll you attempt, or an enemy takes a status penalty to the next saving throw they attempt against a spell you cast.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).name: Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

You transform into a Medium angel battle form. You gain the angel and celestial traits. You have hands in this battle form. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points and weakness 10 to unholy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Balisse Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; Perception modifier of +26 to detect lies and illusions unless your own modifier is higher;

    • Melee 1 scimitar (forceful, sweep), Damage 2d6+12 slashing plus 2d6 fire.

Heightened (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

Heightened (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

Heightened (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.name: Spell Effect: Angelic Halo
Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jPZXZjetdauqYuEH]{Aura: Angelic Halo}

If you are healed by a heal spell, you gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.name: Spell Effect: Angelic Wings
Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kRsmUlSWhi6PJvZ7]{Angelic Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius.

Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.name: Spell Effect: Anima Invocation
Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X0t0gr7S7CeCt2Q5]{Anima Invocation (Modified)}

You gain resistance to all damage and a status bonus to saves against effects created by evil creatures. Your Strikes gain the holy trait, the effects of the ghost touch rune, and deal additional spirit damage.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature.name: Spell Effect: Animal Feature
Spell Effect: Animal Feature.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}

You gain one animalistic feature.

Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).name: Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape)
Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}

You transform yourself into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 16 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +9, and your damage bonus is +1. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack bonus is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +9, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of animal you choose:

  • Ape

    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (3rd) You instead gain 10 temporary HP, AC = 17 + your level, attack modifier +14, damage bonus +5, and Athletics +14.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +9, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +7 and double the number of damage dice, and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Animate Rope.name: Spell Effect: Animate Rope
Spell Effect: Animate Rope.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rVANhQgB8Uqi9PTl]{Animate Rope}

You take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed (-20-foot on a critical success).

Spell Effect: Anointed Ground.name: Spell Effect: Anointed Ground
Spell Effect: Anointed Ground.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y3jlOfgsQH1JjkJE]{Anointed Ground}

Choose aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead. You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws against the chosen creatures.

Spell Effect: Ant Haul.name: Spell Effect: Ant Haul
Spell Effect: Ant Haul.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X9dkmh23lFwMjrYd]{Ant Haul}

You can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.

Spell Effect: Anticipate Peril.name: Spell Effect: Anticipate Peril
Spell Effect: Anticipate Peril.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EUMjrJJwSgsqNidi]{Anticipate Peril}

You gain a status bonus to your next initiative roll.

Spell Effect: Apex Companion.name: Spell Effect: Apex Companion
Spell Effect: Apex Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qqQYrXaRJXr7uc4i]{Apex Companion}.

Your animal companion gains the following statistics and abilities while in its apex form.

  • Your animal companion becomes Huge and its attacks have 15-foot reach. It must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • +10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

Note: this effect will not increase your animal companion's damage dice by one step, and will not apply the deadly d12 trait to their attack.

Spell Effect: Arcane Countermeasure.name: Spell Effect: Arcane Countermeasure
Spell Effect: Arcane Countermeasure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.h47yv6j6x1pUtzlr]{Arcane Countermeasure}

You gain a +2 status bonus to any saving throws, skill checks, AC, or DC against the triggering spell.

Spell Effect: Arcane Explosion.name: Spell Effect: Arcane Explosion
Spell Effect: Arcane Explosion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KY2xyMavZHAoG69D]{Arcane Explosion}

You gain the incorporeal trait, are immune to disease, poison, and precision damage, and gain resistance to all damage equal to your level (except force damage, spirit damage, and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), with double the resistance against non-magical damage.

Spell Effect: Armor of Bones.name: Spell Effect: Armor of Bones
Spell Effect: Armor of Bones.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pSNLufPPsReKQtJR]{Armor of Bones}

You gain resistance to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage.

Spell Effect: Ash Form.name: Spell Effect: Ash Form
Spell Effect: Ash Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2B0C22OuX9YrIJ5y]{Ash Form}

You gain fast healing 3, resistance to piercing and slashing damage, and immunity to bleed and precision damage.

Spell Effect: Athletic Rush.name: Spell Effect: Athletic Rush
Spell Effect: Athletic Rush.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UGJzJRJDoonfWqqI]{Athletic Rush}.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks.

Spell Effect: Augmented Body.name: Spell Effect: Augmented Body
Spell Effect: Augmented Body.description:
Choose any one effect of your choice.

  • Ablative Plating You gain resistance 1 to physical damage.
  • Clockwork Arm You gain a clockwork fist unarmed attack, which has the agile, finesse, and free-hand traits and deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage.
  • Spined Fingertips You gain a climb Speed of 20 feet.
  • Spring-Loaded Legs You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Heightened (3rd) The ablative plating's resistance increases to 2. The clockwork fist is a +1 striking weapon.

Heightened (5th) The ablative plating's resistance increases to 3, and the clockwork fist is a +2 striking weapon.

Heightened (7th) The ablative plating's resistance increases to 4, and the clockwork fist is a +2 greater striking weapon.

Heightened (9th) The ablative plating's resistance increases to 5 and the clockwork fist is a +3 major striking weapon.

Spell Effect: Bane.name: Spell Effect: Bane
Spell Effect: Bane.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}.

You take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Bathe in Blood.name: Spell Effect: Bathe in Blood
Spell Effect: Bathe in Blood.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bRW61IbjaFea0wcv]{Bathe in Blood}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Make an Impression.

Spell Effect: Battlefield Persistence.name: Spell Effect: Battlefield Persistence

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2jWVNdVlbJq84dfT]{Battlefield Persistence}

Spell Effect: Benediction.name: Spell Effect: Benediction
Spell Effect: Benediction.description:

You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to AC while within the emanation.

Choose one saving throw: Fortitude, Reflex, or Will. The target gets a +4 status bonus to that saving throw.

If you cast the two-action version, you additionally receive the following: if you choose Fortitude, the target gains resistance 15 to poison. If you choose Reflex, the target gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speeds. If you choose Will, the target gains resistance 15 to mental damage.

Spell Effect: Blood Ward.name: Spell Effect: Blood Ward

Spell Effect: Bottle the Storm.name: Spell Effect: Bottle the Storm

Spell Effect: Calm.name: Spell Effect: Calm

You take a -1 status penalty to your attack rolls.

You regain additional Hit Points from healing effects.

Spell Effect: Cascade Countermeasure.name: Spell Effect: Cascade Countermeasure

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rtisvvvhkpZPdgXc]{Cascade Countermeasure}

You gain resistance against damage from spells.

Spell Effect: Cauterize Wounds.name: Spell Effect: Cauterize Wounds
Spell Effect: Cauterize Wounds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sBSalosrt7C4IXas]{Cauterize Wounds}

You can attempt to recover from your persistent bleed damage, with the lower DC for particularly effective assistance.

Spell Effect: Celestial Brand.name: Spell Effect: Celestial Brand
Spell Effect: Celestial Brand.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WlTR9JlEcjRmGiD]{Celestial Brand}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against the marked creature, and deal additional spirit damage to it.

Spell Effect: Charged Javelin.name: Spell Effect: Charged Javelin
Spell Effect: Charged Javelin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g1eY1vN44mgluE33]{Charged Javelin}

Others gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against you, and you take a -1 status penalty to saves against electricity effects.

Spell Effect: Charged Javelin (Attacker).name: Spell Effect: Charged Javelin (Attacker)
Spell Effect: Charged Javelin (Attacker).description:

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against the origin.

Spell Effect: Chromatic Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NBSBFHxBm88qxQUy]{Chromatic Armor}

You gain resistance to the indicated damage and shed bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Spell Effect: Cinder Gaze.name: Spell Effect: Cinder Gaze
Spell Effect: Cinder Gaze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mOUwbIN1SUp8FyPR]{Cinder Gaze}.

  1. Terrible Danger You gain a +2 status bonus to your next initiative roll.
  2. New Life The next time you take damage, just before taking the damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 1 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
  3. Vivid Insight (fortune) The next time you attempt a check to Recall Knowledge, roll twice and take the higher result.
  4. Good Fortune (fortune) The next time you attempt a saving throw, roll twice and take the better result.

Spell Effect: Claws of the Otter.name: Spell Effect: Claws of the Otter
Spell Effect: Claws of the Otter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yNTfght6fu9WYKmx]{Claws of the Otter}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and you gain a claws unarmed attack. They're an agile, finesse, unarmed attack that deals slashing damage and additional cold damage.

Spell Effect: Clawsong.name: Spell Effect: Clawsong
Spell Effect: Clawsong.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7OFKYR1VY6EXDuiR]{Clawsong}

Your claw attack gains the versatile (piercing) trait, and deals 1d6 slashing damage. If your claw attack already deals 1d6 slashing damage, it deals 1d8 instead.

If its claw attack already had the versatile (piercing) trait, it gains the deadly 1d8 trait.

Spell Effect: Clinging Ice.name: Spell Effect: Clinging Ice
Spell Effect: Clinging Ice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MraZBLJ4Be3ogmWL]{Clinging Ice}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Cloak of Light.name: Spell Effect: Cloak of Light
Spell Effect: Cloak of Light.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ba1RyDpwq6tfW8VM]{Cloak of Light}

You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Coiling Dance.name: Spell Effect: Coiling Dance
Spell Effect: Coiling Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RcZbmSZf2bFYQtTj]{Coiling Dance}

Your attacks and spells gain the holy trait.

Spell Effect: Community Repair.name: Spell Effect: Community Repair
Spell Effect: Community Repair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oND3oFBjxrhyVvyG]{Community Repair}

On a critical success, you receive a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects and a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

On a critical failure, you take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.name: Spell Effect: Competitive Edge
Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NOB92Wpn7jXvtyVW]{Competitive Edge}

You gain a status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks. This bonus increases if an enemy critically succeeds at an attack roll or skill check.

Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon
Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fkUCvynklBGb4LaI]{Conductive Weapon}

The target becomes a +1 shock weapon. If any target of an attack with the weapon is wearing metal armor or is primarily made of metal, the electricity damage die from the shock rune is 1d12.

Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.name: Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant Thought)
Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dby1eQ7y5dXBWlyc]{Contagious Idea}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank.

Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.name: Spell Effect: Corrosive Body
Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9aFg4EuOBVz0i3Lb]{Corrosive Body}

You gain acid immunity. Your unarmed attacks deal additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain temporary Hit Points. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage.

Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (Temp HP).name: Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (Temp HP)
Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (Temp HP).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9aFg4EuOBVz0i3Lb]{Corrosive Body}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).name: Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon)
Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHUs4qn27RrdFQ5Y]{Cosmic Form}

You transform into a Large battle form. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Moon Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;

    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d4+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 moonbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 2d4+10 fire; this form's fire damage is silver for resistances, weaknesses, and the like;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Countless Eyes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ykyKclKTCMp2SFXa]{Countless Eyes}

You can't be flanked. When you roll a success on Seek action, you critically succeed instead.

Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem.name: Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem
Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Cutting Eye.name: Spell Effect: Cutting Eye

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mMyMOxYzMxADdO5M]{Cutting Eye}

You transform into a Medium daemon battle form. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to holy.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Ceustodaemon Speed 25 feet;

    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 spirit;
    • any successful jaws or claw Strike deals an additional 1d6 damage, and you take the same amount of damage.

Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Meladaemon).name: Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Meladaemon)
Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Meladaemon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aSDfGcUOUVGU5m1g]{Daemon Form}

You transform into a Large daemon battle form. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to holy.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Meladaemon Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;

    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d8 slashing plus 1d6 spirit and 1d6 void, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form}

You transform into a Large animal battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying dinosaur. While in this form, you gain the animal and dinosaur traits. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ankylosaurus

    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach, or 20-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Heightened (7th) Your battle form is Gargantuan and your attacks have 20-foot reach, or 25-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

Spell Effect: Discern Secrets.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UmXhuKrYZR3W16mQ]{Discern Secrets}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the statistic used for the Recall Knowledge, Seek, or Sense Motive roll (a skill or Perception) on the roll and as long as you Sustain the spell.

Spell Effect: Discomfiting Whispers.name: Spell Effect: Discomfiting Whispers
Spell Effect: Discomfiting Whispers.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.t1e3U2eluRsp2izf]{Discomfiting Whispers}

You must roll twice on your first attack roll and take the lower result.

Spell Effect: Distracting Decoy.name: Spell Effect: Distracting Decoy
Spell Effect: Distracting Decoy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z8bHh8KVttslQIU9]{Distracting Decoy}

Failure The creature is off-guard until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks while it's off-guard.

Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.name: Spell Effect: Divine Vessel
Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hiVL8qsnTJtpouw0]{Divine Vessel}

You accept otherworldly energies into your body; while you are still recognizably yourself, you gain the features of one of your deity's servitors. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 10 to lawful.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional spirit damage.
  • You gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2d10 piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Draconic Barrage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.S6Kkk15MWGqzC00a]{Draconic Barrage}

Your Strikes with weapons or unarmed attacks deal additional damage of the chosen type.

Spell Effect: Dragon Claws.name: Spell Effect: Dragon Claws
Spell Effect: Dragon Claws.description:
Granted by Dragon Claws

Vicious claws grow from your fingers. They are finesse unarmed attacks that deal slashing damage and extra damage of a type determined by the dragon in your bloodline. You gain resistance to the same damage type.

Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).name: Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine)
Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

You transform into a Large dragon battle form. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (primal, bludgeoning) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Adamantine

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.level,8),14,10))d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4d6 damage.

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (poison, primal) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Horned

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 poison;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[poison]|options:area-damage]

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4d6 damage.

Spell Effect: Dragon Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}

Spell Effect: Draw Ire.name: Spell Effect: Draw Ire
Spell Effect: Draw Ire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Draw Ire}

The target takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you. On a critical failure the penalty is -2.

Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).name: Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success)
Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Draw Ire}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you. The spell ends at the end of the target's next turn.

Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.name: Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning
Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.n7OgbKme4hNwxVwQ]{Draw the Lightning}

Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.name: Spell Effect: Dread Ambience
Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1QMjWGq1DPOQr4VL]{Dread Ambience}

Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.name: Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge
Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.caehfpQz7yp9yNzz]{Dutiful Challenge}

Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.name: Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground)
Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake}

Creatures on the shaking ground take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, AC, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Eat Fire.name: Spell Effect: Eat Fire
Spell Effect: Eat Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FWuLUKIbkJZjBiuA]{Eat Fire}

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).name: Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the air trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;

    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3d12+4 electricity.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth).description:

(This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;

    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes @Damage[5[piercing]] damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[5d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+12 fire plus 2d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Metal).description:

A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[2d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC; a creature made of metal, with the metal trait, or wearing metal armor takes a –1 circumstance penalty on this save. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 blade (reach 25 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 3d12+15 piercing;
    • Ranged 1 metal shard (range increment 40 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 4d8+6 piercing.

    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+18 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Wood).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

    • Lush Growth (aura, wood) 30 feet. Ground in the area is difficult terrain, and any time a creature in the area regains HP from a healing vitality effect, the aura grants a +5 status bonus to the healing;
    • Woody Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+18 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 seed (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption
Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9TauMFkIsmvKJNzZ]{Elemental Absorption}

You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen elemental trait.

Spell Effect: Elemental Betrayal.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Betrayal
Spell Effect: Elemental Betrayal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f9uqHnNBMU0774SF]{Elemental Betrayal}

When you Cast this Spell, choose air, earth, metal, fire, water, or wood. The target gains weakness to that trait.

Spell Effect: Elemental Form.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Form
Spell Effect: Elemental Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}

You transform into an elemental battle form.

Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Gift
Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.e36Z2t6tLdW3RUzZ]{Elemental Gift}

Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus.
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would Shove or Trip it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it prone.
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1d6 persistent fire damage on a hit.
  • Metal The target's Strikes using a metal weapon or an unarmed attack deal an additional 1d4 electricity damage on a hit and get a +1 status bonus to the attack roll if the target is made of metal or wearing metal armor.
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed.
  • Wood The target gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank, then gains half that number of temporary HP at the start of each of its turns.

Spell Effect: Elemental Motion.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Motion
Spell Effect: Elemental Motion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B8aCUMCHCIMUCEVK]{Elemental Motion}

You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element.

  • Air You gain a fly Speed.
  • Earth You gain a burrow Speed.
  • Fire You gain a fly Speed.
  • Metal You gain a burrow Speed.
  • Water You gain a swim Speed.
  • Wood You gain a climb Speed.

Spell Effect: Elemental Sheath.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Sheath
Spell Effect: Elemental Sheath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WkqamCF8r4O5Gh0n]{Elemental Sheath}

Choose air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood; the spell gains that trait. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and resistance to two types of damage based on the element you choose.

Air bludgeoning and electricity

Earth bludgeoning and poison

Fire fire and slashing

Metal acid and slashing

Water cold and piercing

Wood piercing and void.

Spell Effect: Elephant Form.name: Spell Effect: Elephant Form
Spell Effect: Elephant Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zjYQyuBNT5VjV4mz]{Elephant Form}

You transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a elephant or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus. This spell has the effects of dinosaur form, except you gain the following specific abilities instead of the form-specific abilities of dinosaur form.

  • Speed 40 feet;
  • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning.
  • Melee 1 trunk (reach 10 feet), Effect grabbing trunk;
  • Melee 1 tusk (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 piercing.

Grabbing Trunk A creature up to two sizes smaller that's hit by your trunk is grabbed. If you succeed at your Grapple check against a creature grabbed by your trunk, you can reposition the creature to another space within your trunk's reach.

Heightened (5th) Your elephant form is Huge; your trunk and tusk attacks have 15-foot reach, and your foot attack has 10-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Heightened (7th) Your elephant form is Gargantuan; your trunk and tusk attacks have 20-foot reach, and your foot attack has 15-foot reach. Your AC is 21 + your level and you instead gain 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

Spell Effect: Embodiment of Battle.name: Spell Effect: Embodiment of Battle
Spell Effect: Embodiment of Battle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X4On99Nti8gjWywG]{Embodiment of Battle}

You gain a status bonus to attack and damage rolls made with weapon or unarmed attacks, and you gain the Reactive Strike reaction; this reaction gains the apparition trait. You take a –2 status penalty to your spell attack modifiers and your spell DCs.

Spell Effect: Embrace Nothingness.name: Spell Effect: Embrace Nothingness
Spell Effect: Embrace Nothingness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mau1Olq58ECF0ZPi]{Embrace Nothingness}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to your level.

Spell Effect: Embrace the Pit.name: Spell Effect: Embrace the Pit
Spell Effect: Embrace the Pit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ilGsyGLGjjIPHbyP]{Embrace the Pit}

You gain resistance to fire, poison and physical damage (except silver).

Spell Effect: Enduring Might.name: Spell Effect: Enduring Might
Spell Effect: Enduring Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eG1fBodYwolaXK98]{Enduring Might}

You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

Spell Effect: Energy Absorption.name: Spell Effect: Energy Absorption
Spell Effect: Energy Absorption.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LoBjvguamA12iyW0]{Energy Absorption}

You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage from the triggering effect (one type of your choice). The resistance applies only to the triggering effect's initial damage.

Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.name: Spell Effect: Energy Aegis
Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.m2xFMNyQiUKQDRaj]{Energy Aegis}

The target gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void damage.

Spell Effect: Enlarge.name: Spell Effect: Enlarge
Spell Effect: Enlarge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

You grow to size Large and are clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

Heightened (4th) You grow to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and your reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if you started out Tiny).

Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell.

Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).name: Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th)
Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Huge. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by 10 feet (or by 15 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +4 status bonus to melee damage. The Spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Spell Effect: Enlarge Companion.name: Spell Effect: Enlarge Companion
Spell Effect: Enlarge Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8rj45fKzCFcB0fxs]{Enlarge Companion}

You grow to size Large. Your equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. You are clumsy 1, your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

Heightened (4th) You instead grow to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the your reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if your started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.name: Spell Effect: Entangling Flora
Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}

The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Spell Effect: Entreat Spirit.name: Spell Effect: Entreat Spirit
Spell Effect: Entreat Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Yph1UqZU8vMc9bJG]{Entreat Spirit}

You gain a status bonus to an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill, and to saving throws against curse, death, emotion, and fear effects.

Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.name: Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel
Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X4T5RlQBrdpmA35n]{Entropic Wheel}

When you Cast a Spell that deals fire damage, the target also takes cold damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. When you Cast a Spell that deals cold damage, the target also takes fire damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel.

Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.name: Spell Effect: Entwined Roots
Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VDK5cQ94BszDrMiJ]{Entwined Roots}

You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.name: Spell Effect: Envenom Companion
Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gWmLT5SkA0qH2mNE]{Envenom Companion}

The first time each round you hit a creature with an unarmed Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage, that Strike deals an additional 1d8 poison damage. A creature that is damaged by this poison must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's also clumsy 1 for 1 round.

Heightened (+3) The poison damage increases by 1d8 and the clumsy value imposed on a failed save increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Failure or.name: Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Failure or Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Failure or.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Z2oSFY2fT8zLkK4P]{Equal Footing}

You take a –15-foot status penalty to all Speeds, and you can't benefit from bonuses to your Speeds nor take other penalties to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Success).name: Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Success)
Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Z2oSFY2fT8zLkK4P]{Equal Footing}

You take a –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds.

Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal.name: Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal
Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mTpPZIJ2sdgusPP1]{Euphoric Renewal}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves and temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Everlight.name: Spell Effect: Everlight
Spell Effect: Everlight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Everlight}

The gemstone you touch glows, spreading bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.name: Spell Effect: Evolution Surge
Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lV8FkHZtzZu7Cy6j]{Evolution Surge}

Choose one of the following effects:

  • You gain low-light vision and darkvision.
  • You gain scent as an imprecise sense up to 30 feet.
  • You can breathe underwater and gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. If you are aquatic, you can breathe air and gain a land Speed equal your swim Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. You gain the amphibious trait.
  • You gain a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Heightened (3rd)

  • You become Large, instead of your previous size. This increases your reach to 10 feet but doesn't change any other statistics.
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed.

Heightened (5th)

  • You become Huge, instead of your previous size. This has the same effects as the 3rd-rank option to become Large, except your reach increases to 15 feet.
  • You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Extract Poison.name: Spell Effect: Extract Poison
Spell Effect: Extract Poison.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CLThxp8Qf43IQ3Sb]{Extract Poison}

You add 1d6 poison damage per level of the poison you counteracted to the chosen weapon's Strike damage.

Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.name: Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd
Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yH13KXUK2x093NUv]{Face in the Crowd}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception and Stealth checks to go unnoticed among the crowd, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by the crowd.

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Fail.name: Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Fail.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure)
Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}

The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Spell Effect: False Vitality.name: Spell Effect: False Vitality
Spell Effect: False Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Vitality}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.name: Spell Effect: Ferrous Form
Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.89Hj5QuqvcwVXcqj]{Ferrous Form}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, fatigued, healing, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, vitality, and void.

Your fist Strikes have a 1d10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses).

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).name: Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into a Medium fey battle form. You gain the fey trait, have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Dryad The temporary HP gained increases to 30; Speed 25 feet; weakness 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 1d12+8 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Elananx).description:

  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Elananx Speed 30 feet; resistance 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1d6+8 piercing plus 1d6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 1d6 slashing.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Naiad Speed 25 feet, swim 25 feet; resistance 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 aqueous fist (water) Damage 1d8+8 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Redcap).description:

Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Unicorn).name: Spell Effect: Fey Form (Unicorn)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Unicorn).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into Large a fey battle form. You gain the fey trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.

Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 1d10+8 piercing plus 1 spirit;
    • Melee 1 hoof (agile), Damage 1d8 bludgeoning;
    • all Strikes have the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body.name: Spell Effect: Fiery Body
Spell Effect: Fiery Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You gain fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, weakness 5 to cold and to water, and a fly speed of 40 feet. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).

Heightened (9th) Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 2d4 fire damage, and you have a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).name: Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level)
Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You gain fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, weakness 5 to cold and to water, and a fly Speed of 60 feet. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage.

Your unarmed attacks deal 2d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).

Spell Effect: Figment.name: Spell Effect: Figment
Spell Effect: Figment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0zU8CPejjQFnhZFI]{Figment}

You can attempt to Create a Diversion with the illusion, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to your Deception check.

Spell Effect: Fire Shield.name: Spell Effect: Fire Shield
Spell Effect: Fire Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}

You gain resistance to cold damage. You can Raise a Shield with the fire shield as a normal shield to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Flame Barrier.name: Spell Effect: Flame Barrier
Spell Effect: Flame Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y7Tusv3CieZktkkV]{Flame Barrier}

You gain fire resistance against the triggering effect.

Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.name: Spell Effect: Flame Dancer
Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.p6ebe2PliRkGbmiV]{Flame Dancer}

The target's unarmed Strikes deal additional fire damage. Critical hits with these Strikes also deal persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.name: Spell Effect: Flame Wisp
Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3q9tBMWsWQKlXPPJ]{Flame Wisp}

Each time you hit a creature with a Strike, you deal fire damage.

Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.name: Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance
Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YgbYvkLvnWJ4WfEA]{Flashy Disappearance}

You become undetected to all creatures unless they can see invisible creatures. You Stride. At the end of your movement, if you have cover, greater cover, or concealment, attempt a Stealth check to Hide. You gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. The invisibility then ends, and you either become observed or hidden to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one.

Spell Effect: Fleet Step.name: Spell Effect: Fleet Step
Spell Effect: Fleet Step.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}

You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Flicker.name: Spell Effect: Flicker
Spell Effect: Flicker.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Flicker}

You gain resistance to all damage, except force.

Spell Effect: Fly.name: Spell Effect: Fly
Spell Effect: Fly.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.name: Spell Effect: Font of Serenity
Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yY1H5zhO5dHmD8lz]{Font of Serenity}.

Allies within the area gain a status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.name: Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward
Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}

You gain a status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

Spell Effect: Foresight.name: Spell Effect: Foresight
Spell Effect: Foresight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

You gain a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and aren't off-guard against undetected creatures or when flanked.

Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).name: Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FTR8m4qrhYzTRyrD]{Forge}

You gain weakness to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Fortify Summoning.name: Spell Effect: Fortify Summoning
Spell Effect: Fortify Summoning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tWzxuJdbXqvskdIo]{Fortify Summoning}

The target gains a +1 status bonus to all checks and DCs (including its AC).

Spell Effect: Fortifying Brew.name: Spell Effect: Fortifying Brew
Spell Effect: Fortifying Brew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yRf59eFtZ50cGlem]{Fortifying Brew}

You gain temporary Hit Points. On a critical success, you also gain a +2 status bonus to saves against diseases and poisons.

Spell Effect: Fortissimo Composition.name: Spell Effect: Fortissimo Composition
Spell Effect: Fortissimo Composition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition}

Increase the status bonus from the composition to +2 (+3 on a critical success).

Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry.name: Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry
Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fxRaWoeOGyi6THYH]{Frenzied Revelry}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects while in the area. Whenever someone benefiting from this bonus critically succeeds at a saving throw against an enemy's mental effect, its revelry increases, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry (Critical.name: Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry (Critical)
Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fxRaWoeOGyi6THYH]{Frenzied Revelry}

Spell Effect: Garden of Healing.name: Spell Effect: Garden of Healing
Spell Effect: Garden of Healing.description:

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Girzanje's March.description:
Granted by Girzanje's March

Heightened (7th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Heightened (10th) The status bonus increases to +3.

Spell Effect: Glass Shield.name: Spell Effect: Glass Shield
Spell Effect: Glass Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cgfl9Qr46bKaA59e]{Glass Shield}

Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.name: Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws
Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SdXFiQ4Py8761sNO]{Glutton's Jaws}

Spell Effect: Goodberry.name: Spell Effect: Goodberry
Spell Effect: Goodberry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQuwLqtFFYt0K15N]{Cornucopia}.

You are holding one or more goodberries, which remain fresh for the duration of the spell.

You can consume one or more goodberries from the same casting with an Interact action to regain 1d6+4 Hit Points per goodberry.

Spell Effect: Gravity Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Gravity Weapon
Spell Effect: Gravity Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IWUe32Y5k2QFd7YQ]{Gravity Weapon}

Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.name: Spell Effect: Gray Shadow

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rTvNWcKNpOnGklGF]{Gray Shadow}

The greater shadow's shadow hand Strike deals an additional 1d8 poison damage.

Spell Effect: Guidance.name: Spell Effect: Guidance
Spell Effect: Guidance.description:

Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.name: Spell Effect: Guided Introspection
Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.description:

Spell Effect: Halcyon Mists.name: Spell Effect: Halcyon Mists
Spell Effect: Halcyon Mists.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IERHT6v4o5ISvuJG]{Halcyon Mists}

Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.name: Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground
Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4bFxUA59xeq6Snhw]{Hallowed Ground}

Undead creatures have weakness to vitality damage while in the area.

Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.name: Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice
Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bSDTWUIvgXkBaEv8]{Hand of the Apprentice}

You deal the weapon's damage as if you had hit with a melee Strike, but adding your spellcasting ability modifier to damage, rather than your Strength modifier. On a critical success, you deal double damage, and you add the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Spell Effect: Harrowing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ofAQyLtLEGnOIs3N]{Harrowing}

Randomly determine a harrow suit. The creature can reroll any associated check they just made, gaining a +4 status bonus to the reroll if the ritual was a critical success. If the ritual was a failure, it gets a –4 status penalty.

Spell Effect: Haste.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ant

    • Speed 30 feet, climb Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You envision a simple bug and transform into a Medium animal battle form. When you cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as such as a ladybug or scarab for beetle), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Beetle
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.
