  • Divine You gain temporary Hit Points.
  • Primal You have a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

Pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Chilling Ice You gain resistance 10 to cold.
  • Ice Glide While moving along a smooth surface, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your land Speed.
  • Icy Claws Your hands morph into vicious, piercing claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hands free, you gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile and finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1d6 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 2d6 cold damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

Pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You grow to size Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger.
  • Fiery Grasp You gain a lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage as their base damage, plus an additional 2d6 fire damage and 1d6 persistent fire damage.
  • Warming Flames You gain resistance 5 to cold and fire.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering Heart
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3526YUgCvB5ZsKuX]{Mantle of the Unwavering Heart}

Pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Evergreen Vitality You gain fast healing 3 and a +2 bonus to saves against poison and disease. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.
  • Overwhelming Perfume (aura, olfactory) A cloud of potent floral scent surrounds you in a 15-foot emanation. Creatures in the aura can't benefit from the scent ability and are sickened 1 as long as they remain in the aura. The sickness is a disease effect.
  • Towering Trunk You grow to your size to Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a grasping branch unarmed attack; this attack is in the brawling weapon group and deals 2d8 bludgeoning damage plus Grab.
  • Unyielding Will You're immune to being fascinated, and you get a +1 bonus to saves and DCs against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Mental Map.name: Spell Effect: Mental Map
Spell Effect: Mental Map.description:

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NIop4eI2i7cKFGad]{Mirecloak}

Spell Effect: Mirror Image.name: Spell Effect: Mirror Image
Spell Effect: Mirror Image.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}

Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on [[/r 1d4]]). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1-2 on [[/r 1d6]]). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1-3 on [[/r 1d6]]).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Worm)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into a Huge battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Cave Worm

    • Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+15 piercing plus 2d6 persistent poison;
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet) Damage 2d8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Inexorable You automatically recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1ul2dasQBdlaMEC5]{Heart of the Kaiju}

You take on a kaiju form. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities.

Kaiju Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5;

Melee 1 jaws (reach 20 feet), Damage 3d12+20 piercing;

Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 20 feet), Damage 3d8+20 slashing;

Breath Weapon 2 (evocation, primal) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes 15d6 damage (of your chosen damage type), with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for 1d4 rounds.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into a Huge battle form. While in this form, you gain the beast trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Phoenix

    • Speed 30 feet, fly 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d6+12 piercing plus 2d4 fire and 2d4 persistent fire;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d8+12 slashing;
    • Shroud of Flame (aura, fire, primal) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can activate or deactivate this aura with a Sustain action.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serpent)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into a Huge battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Sea Serpent

    • Speed 20 feet, swim 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 25 feet), Damage 2d8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Spine Rake 2 (move) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes @Damage[(4d8+10)[slashing]] damage (@Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] against your spell DC).

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy
Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}

You gain temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds, and weakness to silver. You also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. If a target is in the light of a full moon, it also grows by one size if it were Medium or smaller. This increases the reach of a Medium or Tiny creature by 5 feet.

Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.name: Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience
Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine.

Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.name: Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment
Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mnhuvqTIELcpJOFX]{Musical Accompaniment}

This music provides a +1 status bonus to Performance checks. You take a –4 penalty to Stealth checks while the music is playing.

Spell Effect: Musical Shift.name: Spell Effect: Musical Shift
Spell Effect: Musical Shift.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3ZxaIw1FOOocJboH]{Musical Shift}

Flat (key signature) Whenever an enemy critically fails at a Strike, saving throw, or skill check, they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in addition to other effects from the critical failure.

Natural (key signature) Enemies take a –2 status penalty to attack rolls.

Sharp (key signature) Whenever an enemy takes piercing or slashing damage, they also take 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

Double (time signature) You and your allies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action each round only for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, Stand, Step, or Stride actions.

Quadruple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.

Triple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and Reflex saving throws.

Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.name: Spell Effect: Mystic Armor
Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mystic Armor}

You gain an item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. At 4th rank or higher, you gain an item bonus to saving throws.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.name: Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher.

You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:

  • Green Man

    • Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 vines (reach 30 feet, versatile P), Damage 6d8+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 thorns (range 100 feet), Damage 6d6+6 piercing;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).

  • Kaiju

    • Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6d10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6d8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6d6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.name: Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity
Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JUJYVbtNNFdvyrBS]{Necromancer's Generosity}

Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.description: Granted by holding the token created by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pHrVvoTKygXeczVG]{Nymph's Token}

Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).name: Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon)
Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).description:

Heightened (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

Spell Effect: One with the Land.description:

Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).name: Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding)
Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0gdZrT9lwO17EIxc]{Ooze Form}

You transform into a Medium ooze battle form. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • Black Pudding Speed 15 feet, climb 15 feet;

    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 2d6+5 bludgeoning and 1d8 acid.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Organsight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH9cH9aDByY91l1d]{Organsight}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a -2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

If you succeed the Recall Knowledge check, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal additional precision damage.

Spell Effect: Overwhelming Perfume.description:

Spell Effect: Pact Broker.description:

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: Spell Effect: Pest Form
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}

You transform into the battle form of a Tiny animal. While in this form, you gain the animal trait and you can't make Strikes. You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 15 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • Speed 20 feet.
  • Weakness 5 to physical damage. (If you take physical damage in this form, you take 5 additional damage.)
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers of +10, unless your own modifier is higher; Athletics modifier -4.

Heightened (4th) You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.

Spell Effect: Phase Bolt.name: Spell Effect: Phase Bolt
Spell Effect: Phase Bolt.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5gophZ4AOKW4VW27]{Phase Bolt}

If you have any circumstance bonuses to AC, you reduce that bonus by 2 for this attack.

Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.name: Spell Effect: Phase Familiar
Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rMOI8JFJ0nT2mrCF]{Phase Familiar}

Your familiar gains resistance to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.name: Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward
Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.description:

Spell Effect: Physical Boost.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1lmzILdCFENln8Cy]{Physical Boost}

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

You transform into a Large plant battle form. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal

    • Speed 30 feet; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TjWHgXqPv5jywMti]{Pocket Library}

Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.name: Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect
Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HOj2YsTpkoMpYJH9]{Practice Makes Perfect}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if you have master or better proficiency in the skill.

Spell Effect: Precious Gleam.name: Spell Effect: Precious Gleam
Spell Effect: Precious Gleam.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.v14zLiiSc4sl9RrK]{Precious Gleam}

Your next attack deals additional precision damage, and it gains the effects of cold iron, silver, or steel.

Spell Effect: Precious Metals.name: Spell Effect: Precious Metals
Spell Effect: Precious Metals.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APTMURAW1N0Wpk4w]{Precious Metals}

The metal in the target transforms from its normal metal into cold iron, copper, gold, iron, silver, or steel. If the spell's rank is 8th or higher, add adamantine and dawnsilver to the options.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons.name: Spell Effect: Primal Summons
Spell Effect: Primal Summons.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons}

Choose air, earth, fire, metal, water or wood; the creature you summon gains the corresponding abilities.

  • Air The creature gains a fly Speed of 60 feet.
  • Earth The creature gains a burrow Speed of 20 feet, reduces its land Speed by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet), and gains resistance 5 to physical damage.
  • Fire The creature's Strikes deal 1d6 extra fire damage, and it gains resistance 10 to fire and weakness 5 to cold and water.
  • Metal The creature's Strikes deal 1d6 extra electricity damage, and it gains resistance 5 to electricity.
  • Water The creature gains a swim Speed of 60 feet, can spend 1 action after a melee attack to attempt a Shove (ignoring multiple attack penalty), and gains resistance 5 to fire.
  • Wood The creature gains a climb speed of 30 feet and resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Prismatic Armor.name: Spell Effect: Prismatic Armor
Spell Effect: Prismatic Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4nEY2BcV85wavKLO]{Prismatic Armor}

You gain resistance to acid, electricity, fire, force, mental, poison, and sonic damage.

Spell Effect: Prismatic Shield.name: Spell Effect: Prismatic Shield
Spell Effect: Prismatic Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AlCFTjSBaCHuRHBv]{Prismatic Shield}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against attacks with larger ranged weapons.

0.label: Targeted by a Large Ranged Weapon

Spell Effect: Protect Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AfOpnnwdZwHi2Tnc]{Protect Companion}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Protection.name: Spell Effect: Protection
Spell Effect: Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Protective Wards.name: Spell Effect: Protective Wards
Spell Effect: Protective Wards.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Wards}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Protector's Sphere.name: Spell Effect: Protector's Sphere
Spell Effect: Protector's Sphere.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DH9Y3RQGWO0GzXGU]{Protector's Sphere}

You gain resistance to all damage.

Spell Effect: Purify Tanglebriar.name: Spell Effect: Purify Tanglebriar
Spell Effect: Purify Tanglebriar.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZVdKM0HkgpWykrqf]{Purify Tanglebriar}

You take a –2 status penalty to Initiative checks.

Spell Effect: Qi Form.name: Spell Effect: Qi Form
Spell Effect: Qi Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YDMOqndvYFu3OjA6]{Qi Form}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. Choose force, spirit, vitality, or void damage. All your Strikes deal 1d6 additional damage of the chosen type.

Your entire body is also surrounded by a glowing corona of the same color as your inner qi; this is a light effect. Your corona is an aura in a 5-foot emanation that deals @Damage[2d6[untyped]] damage of the chosen type to creatures who start their turn within the emanation. You can Sustain to flare your corona out to become a 30-foot emanation or return the corona to a 5-foot emanation.

Your weapons and unarmed attacks lose the nonlethal trait. You take a -2 status penalty to saves against emotion effects but gain a +2 status bonus to saves against all other mental effects.

Spell Effect: Rallying Anthem.name: Spell Effect: Rallying Anthem
Spell Effect: Rallying Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's rank to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation.name: Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

You gain one of the following natural adaptations.

  • Aquatic You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed. If you already had a swim Speed, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.
  • Arctic When you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on ice and snow, you get a critical success instead.
  • Desert When you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sand, you get a critical success instead.
  • Forest You gain scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.
  • Mountain When you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, you get a critical success instead.
  • Plains You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your land Speed.
  • Underground You gain darkvision.

Spell Effect: Rapid Retreat.name: Spell Effect: Rapid Retreat
Spell Effect: Rapid Retreat.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6sNjsNPipZvQ3BGe]{Rapid Retreat}

You gain resistance to all damage equal to your level.

Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.name: Spell Effect: Ray of Frost
Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}

You take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Read Aura.name: Spell Effect: Read Aura
Spell Effect: Read Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}

Spell Effect: Read the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lg73SvJZno1ypPAj]{Read the Air}

You gain a +1 status bonus on your next Diplomacy check to Make an Impression.

Spell Effect: Regenerate.name: Spell Effect: Regenerate
Spell Effect: Regenerate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}

The target gains regeneration, which restores Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns.

Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.name: Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon
Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TYbCj4dgXDOZou9k]{Reinforce Eidolon}

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lZx8jZfKrMEtyGY0]{Rejuvenating Flames}

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xZrTjUub7V09sXZF]{Rejuvenating Touch}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points immediately and at the start of your turns.

Spell Effect: Repel Metal.name: Spell Effect: Repel Metal
Spell Effect: Repel Metal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pZBovpzdBNLQQQmE]{Repel Metal}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.name: Spell Effect: Resilient Touch
Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tCuMXQ0yMrCNwzqW]{Resilient Touch}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +1 status bonus to your saving throws.

Spell Effect: Resist Energy.name: Spell Effect: Resist Energy
Spell Effect: Resist Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. You gain resistance against the damage type you chose.

Spell Effect: Return the Favor.name: Spell Effect: Return the Favor
Spell Effect: Return the Favor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9gMQPCaFM27PEIh4]{Return the Favor}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution.name: Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution
Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Eed8QBWBtpufl1iP]{Revel in Retribution}

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} ability. Whenever you successfully hit with a Reactive Strike, you gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution (Temp.name: Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution (Temp HP)
Spell Effect: Revel in Retribution (Temp.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Eed8QBWBtpufl1iP]{Revel in Retribution}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: River Carving Mountains.name: Spell Effect: River Carving Mountains
Spell Effect: River Carving Mountains.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ew4ToaTU3o8ahKio]{River Carving Mountains}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to each Speed you have.

Spell Effect: Roar of the Dragon.name: Spell Effect: Roar of the Dragon
Spell Effect: Roar of the Dragon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FSu6ZKxr3xdS75wq]{Roar of the Dragon}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks for 10 minutes against dragons that were in the area at the time of casting.

Spell Effect: Rousing Splash.name: Spell Effect: Rousing Splash
Spell Effect: Rousing Splash.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhDIiQlJmrd4UDNC]{Rousing Splash}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Runic Body.name: Spell Effect: Runic Body
Spell Effect: Runic Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{Runic Body}

Your unarmed attacks become +1 striking unarmed attacks, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) The unarmed attacks are +2 greater striking.

Heightened (9th) The unarmed attacks are +3 major striking.

Spell Effect: Runic Impression.name: Spell Effect: Runic Impression
Spell Effect: Runic Impression.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oOaEfsdVpgTXRhrY]{Runic Impression}

Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose.

Spell Effect: Runic Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Runic Weapon
Spell Effect: Runic Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Runic Weapon}

The target weapon becomes a +1 striking weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) The weapon is +2 greater striking.

Heightened (9th) The weapon is +3 major striking.

Spell Effect: Sacred Form.name: Spell Effect: Sacred Form
Spell Effect: Sacred Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MMCQsh12TPaDdPbV]{Sacred Form}

You gain the following statistics and abilities.

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.

  • 10 temporary Hit Points.

  • Speed 40 feet.

  • Resistance 3 against physical damage.

  • Darkvision.

  • A special attack with a sacred armament, which is the only attack you can use. Your attack modifier with the sacred armament is +21, and your damage bonus is +8. The damage dice for Strikes with the weapon are 3d6 bludgeoning damage plus 1d6 spirit damage.

  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own is higher.

Heightened (8th) You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary Hit Points, resistance 4 against physical damage, attack modifier +28, damage bonus +15, and Athletics +29. If you're Medium or smaller, your battle form is Large, and your attacks also have 10-foot reach.

Spell Effect: Safe Passage.name: Spell Effect: Safe Passage
Spell Effect: Safe Passage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IFuEzfmmWyNwVbhY]{Safe Passage}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against harmful effects of the terrain and environment, and resistance to all damage from such effects.

Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.name: Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret
Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OsrtOeG0TvDNnEFH]{Safeguard Secret}.

The targets gain +4 status bonus to skill checks (typically Deception checks) to conceal this knowledge and to saving throws against spells that specifically attempt to obtain this knowledge from them and effects that would force them to reveal it.

Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Failure)
Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APDrC83QljsyHenB]{Sage's Curse}

The target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check. On a critical failure, the target treats the outcomes of all checks to Recall Knowledge as one degree of success worse than the result rolled.

Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Success).name: Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Success)
Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APDrC83QljsyHenB]{Sage's Curse}

The target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check.

Spell Effect: Sand Form.name: Spell Effect: Sand Form
Spell Effect: Sand Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KjC2ya8HD5AENeHI]{Sand Form}

You gain resistance to piercing and slashing damage, and immunity to bleed.

Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).name: Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success)
Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8E97SA9KAWCNdXfO]{Schadenfreude}

You take a -1 status penalty on Perception checks and Will saves.

Spell Effect: Scintillating Safeguard.name: Spell Effect: Scintillating Safeguard
Spell Effect: Scintillating Safeguard.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9W2Qv0wXLg6tQg3y]{Scintillating Safeguard}

You gain resistance to a physical or energy damage type.

Spell Effect: Seal Fate.name: Spell Effect: Seal Fate
Spell Effect: Seal Fate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfKhtVsXF3HKSdmY]{Seal Fate}

You gain weakness to the chosen damage type.

Spell Effect: See the Unseen.name: Spell Effect: See the Unseen
Spell Effect: See the Unseen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}

You can see invisible creatures as though they weren't invisible, although their features are blurred, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and difficult to identify. You also gain a +2 status bonus to checks you make to disbelieve illusions.

Spell Effect: Serrate.name: Spell Effect: Serrate
Spell Effect: Serrate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YKexU7BkwNq4ESCc]{Serrate}

Strikes with the target weapon deal additional slashing damage.

Spell Effect: Share Vision.name: Spell Effect: Share Vision
Spell Effect: Share Vision.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TRlI5zAbNW2hDiH9]{Share Vision}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks.

Spell Effect: Shield.name: Spell Effect: Shield
Spell Effect: Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Shield (Amped).name: Spell Effect: Shield (Amped)
Spell Effect: Shield (Amped).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. When you Shield Block with this spell, one of the three layers breaks and you cease to gain the bonus to AC. You can choose to break additional layers when you Shield Block with this spell. If you break two layers instead of one, increase the Hardness to 1-1/2 × the normal amount. If you break all three layers, increase the Hardness to double the normal amount.

Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit.name: Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit
Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL97DcoJ8us6EwAF]{Shields of the Spirit}

Champion: You Raise your Shield.

Ally: You gain a +1 status bonus to AC while in the Champion's aura.

Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit (Sec.name: Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit (Security)
Spell Effect: Shields of the Spirit (Sec.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YAr465ZVQ4blqDzT]{Security}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3aolZmAj0ue8vc6q]{Greater Security}

If the champion's shield is raised, you gain the same bonus to AC their shield grants.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form.name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form
Spell Effect: Shifting Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form}

You gain one of the following abilities of your choice.

  • You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

Spell Effect: Shillelagh.name: Spell Effect: Shillelagh
Spell Effect: Shillelagh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}

The target weapon becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the weapon against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Spell Effect: Shrink.name: Spell Effect: Shrink
Spell Effect: Shrink.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink}

You shrink to become Tiny in size. Your equipment shrinks with you but returns to its original size if removed. Your reach changes to 0 feet.

Spell Effect: Silence.name: Spell Effect: Silence
Spell Effect: Silence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence}

You make no sound, preventing creatures from noticing you using hearing alone.

Heightened (4th) The spell creates an aura in a 10-foot emanation around you, silencing all sound in or passing through it. While within the aura, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target.

Spell Effect: Silver's Refrain.name: Spell Effect: Silver's Refrain
Spell Effect: Silver's Refrain.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xM35hJacTM1BSXUl]{Silver's Refrain}

Your weapon and unarmed attacks are treated as silver.

Spell Effect: Snake Fangs.name: Spell Effect: Snake Fangs
Spell Effect: Snake Fangs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wLWMswY7aBHEFTRb]{Snake Fangs}

You gain a fangs unarmed attack. They're a finesse, grapple, unarmed attack that deals piercing damage and extra poison damage.

Spell Effect: Song of Silver.name: Spell Effect: Song of Silver
Spell Effect: Song of Silver.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HYXyMFsH0K80etBI]{Song of Silver}

You gain a +2 status bonus to all saving throws against mental effects; this bonus doubles to a +4 status bonus against all fear effects. On a critical success all weapons you wield are treated as silver.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength.name: Spell Effect: Song of Strength
Spell Effect: Song of Strength.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Reposition, Shove, and Trip.

Spell Effect: Soothe.name: Spell Effect: Soothe
Spell Effect: Soothe.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe}

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.name: Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms
Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5XUn9NADr05IyiVw]{Soothing Blossoms}

When you roll a successful save against a poison or disease effect, you get a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Soothing Words.name: Spell Effect: Soothing Words
Spell Effect: Soothing Words.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YGRpHU5yxw73mls8]{Soothing Words}

You gain a status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases against emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.name: Spell Effect: Speaking Sky
Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Zvg0FWzClGbzucFd]{Speaking Sky}

You gain precise motion sense within 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Spectral Advance.name: Spell Effect: Spectral Advance
Spell Effect: Spectral Advance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VNAOHrWhNYX3jKdy]{Spectral Advance}

You have resistance equal to your level to all damage.

Spell Effect: Spiral of Horrors.name: Spell Effect: Spiral of Horrors
Spell Effect: Spiral of Horrors.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Spiral of Horrors}

You are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.

Spell Effect: Spirit Sense.name: Spell Effect: Spirit Sense
Spell Effect: Spirit Sense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3ehSrqTAm7IPqbIZ]{Spirit Sense}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

Spell Effect: Spirit Ward.name: Spell Effect: Spirit Ward
Spell Effect: Spirit Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MFtXn7t5vApQXqlq]{Spirit Ward}

You gain a status bonus to saving throws against spells and effects caused by creatures that have the spirit trait and haunts.

Spell Effect: Spirit of the Beast.name: Spell Effect: Spirit of the Beast
Spell Effect: Spirit of the Beast.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wgAsL86ji5hulh7x]{Spirit of the Beast}

Select from one of the following aspects.

  • Aspect of Might: You gain a status bonus to Athletics checks, Intimidation checks to Demoralize, and Fortitude saves.
  • Aspect of Swiftness: You gain a status bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks to Hide or Sneak, and Reflex saves.
  • Aspect of Insight: You gain a status bonus to Perception checks to Seek, Survival checks to Sense Direction or Track, and Will saves.

Spell Effect: Sting of the Sea.name: Spell Effect: Sting of the Sea
Spell Effect: Sting of the Sea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jyYBuGRfpkZz2kxs]{Sting of the Sea}

The target takes a –2 penalty to Perception checks involving vision.

Spell Effect: Stoke the Heart.name: Spell Effect: Stoke the Heart
Spell Effect: Stoke the Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GeUbPvwdZ4B4l0up]{Stoke the Heart}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls.

Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.name: Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight
Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gSFg9zKwgcNZLMEs]{Stormwind Flight}.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Strength of Mind.name: Spell Effect: Strength of Mind
Spell Effect: Strength of Mind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aMvjaIuPIWN7pbc3]{Strength of Mind}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects and against effects that hinder movement (including those that reduce Speed or apply the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions). This bonus increases to +2 if the source of the effect has the fear trait.

Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.name: Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse
Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X8PSYw6WC2ePYSXd]{Stumbling Curse}

The target takes a -2 status penalty to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Spell Effect: Summon Healing Servitor.name: Spell Effect: Summon Healing Servitor
Spell Effect: Summon Healing Servitor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3r897dYO8oYvuyn5]{Summon Healing Servitor}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.name: Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage
Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vb2dFNtbofJ7A9BW]{Summoner's Visage}

You gain a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate the origin and can add your level to such checks even if you're untrained.

Spell Effect: Sun's Fury.name: Spell Effect: Sun's Fury
Spell Effect: Sun's Fury.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrFUj76CHDBV0vHW]{Sun's Fury}

The weapon deals an additional 1d4 fire and 1 spirit damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch.

Spell Effect: Sure Strike.name: Spell Effect: Sure Strike
Spell Effect: Sure Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}

The next time you make an attack roll, roll twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being Concealed or Hidden.

Spell Effect: Swampcall.name: Spell Effect: Swampcall
Spell Effect: Swampcall.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Speeds (except for your swim Speed, if any) and become off-guard.

Spell Effect: Swarm Form.name: Spell Effect: Swarm Form
Spell Effect: Swarm Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pd2M1XY8EXrSfWgJ]{Swarm Form}

While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance to slashing and piercing damage and weakness to area and splash damage.

Spell Effect: Swear Oath.name: Spell Effect: Swear Oath
Spell Effect: Swear Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AYN0UihkU8Fa8yC6]{Swear Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the readied attack roll or skill check.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream.name: Spell Effect: Sweet Dream
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}

  • Dream of Insight status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks
  • Dream of Glamor status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks
  • Dream of Voyaging +5-foot status bonus to Speed

Spell Effect: Sweetest Solstice.name: Spell Effect: Sweetest Solstice
Spell Effect: Sweetest Solstice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wAJ8mXPYbyAg0qWX]{Sweetest Solstice}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against fear effects. On a critical success you also gain this bonus to emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Tailwind.name: Spell Effect: Tailwind
Spell Effect: Tailwind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Tailwind}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).name: Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours)
Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Tailwind}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Take Root.name: Spell Effect: Take Root
Spell Effect: Take Root.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WUNZizIe6rnVHGcr]{Take Root}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC against attempts to Shove you and a +1 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC against attempts to Disarm or Trip you.

Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.name: Spell Effect: Take its Course (Affliction, Help)
Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to help a target against an affliction.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.name: Spell Effect: Take its Course (Affliction, Hinder)
Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to hinder a target against an affliction.

The target gains a -2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.name: Spell Effect: Tangle Vine
Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine}

You take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds. On a critical success, you are also immobilized.

Spell Effect: Tangling Creepers.name: Spell Effect: Tangling Creepers
Spell Effect: Tangling Creepers.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JbAcSLu62TU1OgNF]{Tangling Creepers}

You take a -10 circumstance penalty to your land, climb or swim speeds while in the area.

Spell Effect: Tempest Cloak.name: Spell Effect: Tempest Cloak
Spell Effect: Tempest Cloak.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.70BjbNRVc4OTLAgN]{Tempest Cloak}

The twisting shield of wind creates difficult terrain in a 5-foot burst surrounding you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against physical ranged attacks. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all defenses against auditory effects.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form.name: Spell Effect: Tempest Form
Spell Effect: Tempest Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist. You gain resistance to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

  • Air You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet.
  • Mist You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet.
  • Water You gain a swim Speed of 20.

Spell Effect: Tempest Touch.name: Spell Effect: Tempest Touch
Spell Effect: Tempest Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EzB9i7R6aBRAtJCh]{Tempest Touch}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.name: Spell Effect: Tempt Fate
Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GqvKSxzN7A7kuFk4]{Tempt Fate}

You gain a status bonus to the triggering saving throw. If the saving throw's result is a success, it becomes a critical success. If it's a failure, it becomes a critical failure, and the critical failure can't be reduced by abilities that usually reduce critical failure.

Spell Effect: The Four Hunters.name: Spell Effect: The Four Hunters
Spell Effect: The Four Hunters.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EdRYr7HmLm9wr71X]{The Four Hunters}

  • East You gain 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to Athletics.
  • North You gain a +1 status bonus to Survival.
  • South You become concealed and gain a +1 status bonus to Stealth.
  • West You gain a +10-foot status bonus to their land Speed and a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics.

Spell Effect: Thermal Remedy.name: Spell Effect: Thermal Remedy
Spell Effect: Thermal Remedy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.l194BTf9cAFlSQ96]{Thermal Remedy}

Choose one of the benefits listed below. Any creature that consumes the targeted drink or food gains that benefit.

  • Gain temporary Hit Points.
  • Gain resistance to fire.
  • Gain a circumstance bonus to saves against disease.

Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis.name: Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis
Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dhpXpzt7TCm8TbHM]{Thermal Stasis}

The target gains resistance 2 against fire damage and resistance 2 against cold damage.

Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.name: Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives
Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X56VdA98VedAfGTU]{Thicket of Knives}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the Feint action anyway, and add your level as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.

Spell Effect: Threefold Limb (Ice).name: Spell Effect: Threefold Limb (Ice)
Spell Effect: Threefold Limb (Ice).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3DY4vbXj0BYSWA7z]{Threefold Limb}

You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.name: Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance
Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mMgLHTLHjjGa206q]{Thundering Dominance}

The target gains a status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the Thundering Roar action.

Spell Effect: Tomorrow's Dawn.name: Spell Effect: Tomorrow's Dawn
Spell Effect: Tomorrow's Dawn.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.a0MfDnUa33oWM74s]{Tomorrow's Dawn}

You cast bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) and gain mental resistance.

Spell Effect: Touch of the Moon.name: Spell Effect: Touch of the Moon
Spell Effect: Touch of the Moon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oXCwHBeDja4e0Mx0]{Touch of the Moon}

You glow with dim light in a 20-foot radius. You also get a benefit based on a phase of the moon, starting with the new moon and changing to the next phase at the end of each of your turns.

  • New Moon You receive no benefit.
  • Waxing Moon You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
  • Full Moon You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, and saves, and a +4 status bonus to damage.
  • Waning Moon You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws. After this phase, return to the new moon.

Spell Effect: Touch of the Void.name: Spell Effect: Touch of the Void
Spell Effect: Touch of the Void.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jFmWSIpJGGebim6y]{Touch of Corruption}.

If the target is yourself, you gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. Otherwise, the target takes a –2 status penalty to AC.

Spell Effect: Trade Death for Life.name: Spell Effect: Trade Death for Life
Spell Effect: Trade Death for Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4U2ZV1v38D0y2CRl]{Trade Death for Life}

You gain fast healing equal to the rank of the spell.

Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Encounter).name: Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Encounter)
Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Encounter).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8Lk9K3tRnV68MQPW]{Transmigrate}

You gain a +1 status bonus to all Strikes, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Skill).name: Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Skill)
Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Skill).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8Lk9K3tRnV68MQPW]{Transmigrate}

You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit.name: Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}

You gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

Heightened (5th) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.

Spell Effect: Traveling Workshop.name: Spell Effect: Traveling Workshop
Spell Effect: Traveling Workshop.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rzcXUF5YmJYxgxEa]{Traveling Workshop}

You are trained in Crafting and Thievery.

Heightened (3rd) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is expert.

Heightened (5th) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is master.

Heightened (9th) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is legendary.

Spell Effect: Tremorsense.name: Spell Effect: Tremorsense
Spell Effect: Tremorsense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EAYViUegegttJF1u]{Tremorsense}

You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Triple Time.name: Spell Effect: Triple Time
Spell Effect: Triple Time.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c8R2fpk88fBwJ1ie]{Triple Time}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: True Target.name: Spell Effect: True Target
Spell Effect: True Target.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AlbpWWN87yGegoAF]{True Target}

For your next attack roll against the marked creature, roll twice and use the better result. You ignore circumstance penalties to the attack roll.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.name: Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.floDCUOSzT0F6r77]{Unblinking Flame Aura}

You gain a +2 status bonus on Perception checks and resistance 10 to cold.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.name: Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aFd00WT266VYPqOG]{Unblinking Flame Ignition}

You gain greater darkvision, low‐light vision, and the ability to see invisible creatures. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become quickened, and you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or Fly using your flames.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.name: Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtJXpiu4ijkB6nP2]{Unbreaking Wave Barrier}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.name: Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZQk2cGBCkATO25w0]{Unbreaking Wave Vapor}

You're concealed against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it.

Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement.name: Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement
Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}

You ignore circumstance penalties to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Unravel Knowledge.name: Spell Effect: Unravel Knowledge
Spell Effect: Unravel Knowledge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EFLXGyIz2HZVSmll]{Unravel Knowledge}

You take a –2 status penalty to any check or DC for the affected ability the first time you use it each round.

Spell Effect: Untamed Form.name: Spell Effect: Untamed Form
Spell Effect: Untamed Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Untamed Form}

You can polymorph into any form listed in pest form, which lasts 10 minutes. All other untamed form shapes last 1 minute. You can add more shapes to your untamed form list with druid feats; your feat might grant you some or all of the shapes from a given polymorph spell.

When you transform into a shape granted by a spell, you gain all the effects of the shape you chose from a version of the spell heightened to untamed form's rank. Untamed form allows you to use your own shapeshifting training more easily than most polymorph spells. When you choose to use your own attack modifier while polymorphed instead of the form's default attack modifier, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls.

Heightened (2nd) You can transform into shapes listed in animal form.

Spell Effect: Untamed Shift.name: Spell Effect: Untamed Shift
Spell Effect: Untamed Shift.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0xR9vrt6uDFl0Umo]{Untamed Shift}

You transform just a part of your body.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.name: Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8eOMAIvT7S1CJSit]{Untwisting Iron Augmentation}

Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.name: Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9DtuMEyHhtHFRp5a]{Untwisting Iron Pillar}

You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Spell Effect: Unusual Anatomy.name: Spell Effect: Unusual Anatomy
Spell Effect: Unusual Anatomy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ddKBoCjmSyPSHcws]{Unusual Anatomy}

You gain resistance to precision damage and resistance to extra damage from critical hits, and you gain darkvision.

Spell Effect: Uplifting Overture.name: Spell Effect: Uplifting Overture
Spell Effect: Uplifting Overture.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f0Z5mqGA6Yu79B8x]{Uplifting Overture}

When you later use the Aid reaction, you can roll Performance instead of the normal skill check, and if you roll a failure, you get a success instead. If you are legendary in Performance, you automatically critically succeed.

Spell Effect: Valiant Anthem.name: Spell Effect: Valiant Anthem
Spell Effect: Valiant Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nRsBM1zkhMmV3VST]{Valiant Anthem}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds and a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Vapor Form.name: Spell Effect: Vapor Form
Spell Effect: Vapor Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Vapor Form}

You lose any item bonus to your AC, gain resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, and a fly Speed of 10 feet.

Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.name: Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)
Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DcmWrD0V5PWQQyDm]{Variable Gravity}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you prone

Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.name: Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams
Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NNoKWiWKqJkdD2ln]{Veil of Dreams}

You take a -1 status penalty to Perception, attack rolls, and Will saves. This penalty increases to -2 for Will saves against sleep effects.

Spell Effect: Veil of Spirits.name: Spell Effect: Veil of Spirits
Spell Effect: Veil of Spirits.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lQbfgAu9uVJQC7x4]{Veil of Spirits}

You are dazzled. On a failure or critical failure, you gain a weakness to spirit damage.

Spell Effect: Vicious Howl.name: Spell Effect: Vicious Howl
Spell Effect: Vicious Howl.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z9pIChNg9PmPmn31]{Vicious Howl}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level and a +4 circumstance bonus to damage.

Spell Effect: Vindicator's Mark.name: Spell Effect: Vindicator's Mark
Spell Effect: Vindicator's Mark.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LegaamqrflbArbWN]{Vindicator's Mark}

Your marked target takes additional damage from all your weapon or unarmed attacks.

Spell Effect: Vision of Weakness.name: Spell Effect: Vision of Weakness
Spell Effect: Vision of Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NhNKzq1DvFxkvTEc]{Vision of Weakness}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe before the end of your turn.

Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.name: Spell Effect: Vital Beacon
Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ikSb3LRGnrwXJBVX]{Vital Beacon}

Either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain @Damage[(@item.level)d((2+2*@item.badge.value))[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points. This healing decreases each time the beacon heals someone.

Spell Effect: Vital Luminance.name: Spell Effect: Vital Luminance
Spell Effect: Vital Luminance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8XuNn0h0rHE24m3B]{Vital Luminance}

You glow with bright light in a 30-foot emanation (and dim light to the next 30 feet).

If an undead creature damages you with an attack or spell while it's within the area of your light, that creature takes vitality damage equal to half your luminance reservoir value. It takes this damage only the first time it damages you in a round. (@Damage[(0.5 * @item.badge.value * @item.level)[vitality]])

You can Dismiss this Spell. When you do, you can target a creature within your light and direct the vitality energy into it. The target must be a willing living creature or an undead creature. This heals a living target or damages an undead target by an amount equal to your luminance reservoir's value. (@Damage[(@item.badge.value * @item.level)[healing]]{Healing})

Note: The reservoir value is the effect level times the badge value of this effect. The effect level will be set automatically when casting the spell.

Spell Effect: Vitrifying Blast.name: Spell Effect: Vitrifying Blast
Spell Effect: Vitrifying Blast.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g2V4ID0pl1ZGAxZj]{Vitrifying Blast}

You gain weakness to sonic and bludgeoning damage.

Spell Effect: Volcanic Eruption.name: Spell Effect: Volcanic Eruption
Spell Effect: Volcanic Eruption.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O7ZEqWjwdKyo2CUv]{Volcanic Eruption}

You are clumsy 1 and take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression.name: Spell Effect: Warding Aggression
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CIjj9CU5ekeq1oLT]{Warding Aggression}

You gain a status bonus to AC against the foe.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (Critic.name: Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (Critical Success)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (Critic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CIjj9CU5ekeq1oLT]{Warding Aggression}

You gain a +3 status bonus to AC against the foe.

Spell Effect: Warp Step.name: Spell Effect: Warp Step
Spell Effect: Warp Step.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sX2g6WFSQPNW9jzx]{Warp Step}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Warping Pull.name: Spell Effect: Warping Pull
Spell Effect: Warping Pull.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UtINSoEJ0u630ia4]{Warping Pull}

You gain resistance to all damage.

Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.name: Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck
Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lmHmKGs1N3yNAvln]{Wash Your Luck}

Once, before rolling a check, you can cancel out a misfortune effect on that roll, as normal when a fortune and misfortune effect apply to the same roll. After canceling out the misfortune effect, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Weaken Earth.name: Spell Effect: Weaken Earth
Spell Effect: Weaken Earth.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eyKkLp8V55ydA64J]{Weaken Earth}

You gain weakness to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.name: Spell Effect: Weapon Surge
Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.W37iBXLsY2trJ1rS]{Weapon Surge}

On your next Strike with the weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll, the weapon deals additional spirit damage, and the Strike gains the sanctified trait.

Spell Effect: Weapon Trance.name: Spell Effect: Weapon Trance
Spell Effect: Weapon Trance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RpGB961b8FjXbGHi]{Weapon Trance}

Your proficiency with martial weapons is equal to your proficiency with simple weapons.

Spell Effect: Wind Jump.name: Spell Effect: Wind Jump
Spell Effect: Wind Jump.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kRxlkPPe6Gr7Du59]{Wind Jump}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Failure.name: Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Failure)
Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B3tbO85GBpzQ3u8l]{Wish-Twisted Form}.

You gain weakness to the chosen damage type, take a -10-foot status penalty to all your Speeds, and a -1 status penalty to your saving throws. On a critical failure, you also takes a -1 status penalty to AC.

Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Success.name: Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Success)
Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Success.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B3tbO85GBpzQ3u8l]{Wish-Twisted Form}.

You gain weakness to the chosen damage type, take a -10-foot status penalty to all your Speeds, and a -1 status penalty to your saving throws.

Spell Effect: Wooden Fists.name: Spell Effect: Wooden Fists
Spell Effect: Wooden Fists.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHjiWCouSacC5b3g]{Wooden Fists}

Your fists deal more bludgeoning damage, lose the nonlethal trait, and have reach.

Spell Effect: Word of Truth.name: Spell Effect: Word of Truth
Spell Effect: Word of Truth.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aF7RiG7c8GzSQLYt]{Word of Truth}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Diplomacy checks.

Spell Effect: Wrathful Storm.name: Spell Effect: Wrathful Storm
Spell Effect: Wrathful Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yLJROsQtyrPIKcDx]{Wrathful Storm}

You take a -4 circumstance penalty to physical ranged attacks.

Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.name: Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction
Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GYD0XZ4t3tQq6shc]{Zealous Conviction}

You gain temporary Hit Points and a status bonus to Will saves against mental effects.
